I am studying my PhD in Mathematics in TU Berlin (http://www.tu-berlin.de/menue/home/?no_cache=1) in the field of signal processing and compressed sensing, and I form a part of the graduate program Berlin Mathematical School (https://www.math-berlin.de/), I am also a part time programmer.
